alert.note: Alert for Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 27 at 6:02AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...SPECIAL AVALANCHE ADVISORY * WHERE...CAIC Front Range zone * WHEN...Beginning 6:00AM Monday December 27. Expires at 6:00AM Wednesday December 29. * IMPACTS...Backcountry avalanche conditions are unusually dangerous. You could trigger large and dangerous avalanches. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Backcountry travelers should plan to take extra precautions. Use conservative decision making, cautious route finding and careful terrain evaluation. Consult www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information. Cooperstein

area.areaDesc: Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
